name: |Box'n'Nutz|
description:
Jon Vinther "I blame Casper... and I hate the name!" wooden spoon/10

Casper Falck Hansen "It's not my fault at all..." trippy/10

Kaare Rievers "The game is about.... *gestures with hands* this big" 11/10

Andreas Frostholm Røeboe "I think the game needs at least one naked viking" horse/10

Sam Surplice "I blame Casper too..." tenoutta/10

Random guy "Ohhh, you guys have a coffee machine, sweet!" thirsty/10
